mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as 'regDate', a.depth, b.no as 'userNo', b.name as 'userName' from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by a.group_no desc, a.order_no asc;
select no, title, contents, group_no as 'groupNo', order_no as 'orderNo', depth, user_no as 'userNo' from board where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board values (null , #{title}, #{contents}, 0, now(), (select max(group_no)+1 from board as b), 1 , 0, #{userNo})
